channel.title: ::jail
channel.description: Hey guys. I made a ::jail command but it doesn't jail them, even though i have correctly coded the coords... it bans them. Can someone PLEASE make me a command to jail someone? type random coords for the X and Y, i'll change those. I also need it so that they can not teleport out, so i think teleblock = 1, or teleblock = true? Please help. I am using an Allstar source 317

item.title: ::jail
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/395191-jailhandler-better-features.html

item.title: ::jail
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

This is because you copied the ban command and just changed the name…

Create a boolean for the player

public boolean isJailed = false;

In the command, set isJailed to true and change the players position to your desired coordinates.

Write to the character file so it saves when they logout.

In the teleport method, add.

if (c.isJailed)
return;

Remove all ban related code in the command.

Read full topic
